text: Charlotte Le Bon (born 4 September 1986) is a Canadian actress and artist. She is known for her work in the Canal+ talk show Le Grand Journal, and the movies Yves Saint Laurent, The Hundred-Foot Journey, and The Walk. She is among the 10 youngest promising French directors of the year 2023 in New York magazine "Elucid magazine" ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian models Category:Canadian television presenters Category:Actors from Montreal
title: Charlotte Le Bon
